== Description ==
Gets an active blog for user, either primary blog or from blogs list.

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$user_id|cast|The user id to look up.}}

== Return Values ==
; <tt>(object)</tt> : Returns an object holding the details of the blog.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_active_blog_for_user($user_id); ?>%%%
